product_name: Tanka Bar Buffalo Cranberry Jerky Bites
long_description: Tanka bites combine real buffalo meat and dried cranberries into a tasty and nutritious snack you can share with your friends while enjoying the outdoors. Prairie-raised American buffalo meat is low in fat and cholesterol; buffalo meat contains polyunsaturated fat and Omega-3 fatty acids. Buffalo Cranberry flavor features tart-sweet cranberries that contain more antioxidant phenols than 20 commonly consumed fruits. Hot Spicy Pepper Blend flavor includes cranberries and a blend of habanero, jalepeno, red pepper and black pepper for just the right amount of kick. Bites provide 7g of protein and 70 calories per serving. Tanka bites contain no trans fats and are hormone-, gluten- and dairy-free; no nitrates, no MSG and no artificial preservatives. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Tanka bites combine real buffalo meat and dried cranberries into a tasty and nutritious snack you can share with your friends while enjoying the outdoors.
